mapper.sql: a.pro_name proName, a.pro_supplier proSupplier, a.memo memo, a.del_flag delFlag
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bus_product a
1=1
AND a.pro_name LIKE '%'||#{proName}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{proName}, '%')
AND a.pro_supplier LIKE '%'||#{proSupplier}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{proSupplier}, '%')
AND a.memo LIKE '%'||#{memo}||'%' CONCAT('%', #{memo}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT
FROM bus_product a
a.del_flag = 0
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_product( id, pro_name, pro_supplier, memo, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{proName}, #{proSupplier}, #{memo}, #{delFlag} )
